mapred

Interface JobTrackerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobTracker

    public interface JobTrackerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    This class is a interface of JobTracker which is a remote object
    Author:
    menglonghe, sidilin

    • Method Detail

      • submitJob

        java.lang.String submitJob(JobConfiguration jobConf,
                         KVPair mapper,
                         KVPair reducer)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to submit job
        Parameters:
        jobConf - the programmer's configuration about the job
        mapper - Mapper class and name
        reducer - Reducer class and name
        Returns:
        String message from Server including "INPUTNOTFOUND", "FAIL" or jobId
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        reducer - Reducer class and name

        java.io.IOException

        JobStatus checkJobStatus(java.lang.Integer jobId)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to check the Job's status
        Parameters:
        jobId - Job ID
        Returns:
        JobStatus including FAIL, SUCCESS, INPROGRESS
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • notifyMapperFinish

        void notifyMapperFinish(java.lang.String node,
                      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,TaskStatusInfo> jobID_taskStatus,
                      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> jobID_parFilePath,
                      int jobID)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to notify the jobTracker that all the mapper workers has done the job and their generating files
        Parameters:
        node - The node handling the mapper task
        jobID_taskStatus - Task status info
        jobID_parFilePath - the Partition files
        jobID -
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • notifyReducerFinish

        void notifyReducerFinish(java.lang.String node,
                       java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<java.lang.Integer,TaskStatusInfo> jobID_taskStatus)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to notify the jobTracker that all the reducer workers has done and they can change the related information
        Parameters:
        node - The node handled the reducer task
        jobID_taskStatus - JobId and task status
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
